groupDesc: Web Designing is the art and science of creating visually appealing and user-friendly websites. It involves crafting layouts, selecting color schemes, designing graphics, and organizing content to deliver a smooth and engaging user experience. It uses tools like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, and Figma to bring ideas to life on the web.
